caption:
The photograph captures a young boy seated outdoors in what appears to be a field of crops under bright sunlight. The boy is dressed in light-colored casual attire consisting of a loosely fitted, unbuttoned, long-sleeve yellow shirt and striped pants. His hair is neatly cut, and he has a focused expression, looking off to the side.

He is seated on the dry, clumpy soil amid small, leafy green plants, indicating a cultivated field. His knees are slightly raised, and his hands rest upon the ground, one among the plants, suggesting a moment of pause in an agricultural setting. Around him, the environment is solely made up of similar vegetation, underlined by a clear sky barely visible on the upper edges of the image. The scene conveys a sense of calm outdoor activity, possibly in a rural or agricultural setting.
title: Young child of migrant family works in sugarbeet field.
